title: Warm Wedding, CEO Loves Me - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Josei   Romance   Slice of Life
tags: Black Belly   Female Protagonist   Modern Day
author: Da Zhou Zhou   大周周
description: The devil would love you only in his own way: 'Remember, don't look at me, don't hold me, and don't kiss me! Turn your face away, as long as you lie down obediently and quietly! ' Just lie down obediently? What did he take her for? An inflatable wife?>
